comments:
I20030205, new workspace (about 1 hour old).
noticed that while editing java file the tab disappears. editor continues to 
function. opening a second java file causes single tab to be created (for the 
second file). closing that second file causes the single tab to disappear and 
you are back with one open editor and zero tabs.

cannot reproduce this problem.

Seems to be a problem in GridLayout. 
The second exception is consequence of the first one.
Moving to SWT for comments.

We can't make this happen in the latest build.  It was probably caused by 
Steve's "z-order" bug on Windows.
